0.1.0.description: Code music with Sonic Pi inside Atom

readme:
# atom-sonic-pi package

Play your code in Sonic Pi.


### How to use

This package adds to commands to your Atom command palette: `Atom Sonic Pi: Play` plays the code in your current buffer in Sonic Pi, `Atom Sonic Pi: Stop` stops Sonic Pi's current loop.

> Note that this plugin requires Sonic Pi to run in the background, as it uses
> OSC to send your code to the currently running Sonic Pi instance. Be aware that [Sam Aaron himself stated](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/sonic-pi/7vDgNhQXfmo) that _"the OSC commands currently available arenâ€™t documented (due to being unstable)"_.


## License

This code is free to use under the terms of the MIT license.
